page.title: 08A DAY OUT IN SQUARE ONE
page.content:
One Tuesday we went out to explore square one. There were only five of us so we had to work quickly. When we arrived we go straight to work and walked up Rumsam Road. While we were walking up Rumsam Road we saw lots of interesting things. We filled in lots of answers on our questionnaires and soon we only had a few questions left to fill in so walked back to the car and drove down to Rock Park where we did our sketches. When we had finished we had a discussion about what we had done during the day. On our way back we sorted out the percentages and when we arrived at school everything was ready to put on paper.
Darryn Welsh
